s0: ^Are you feeling ready for your first expedition?
^I've... already gone. I just got back, actually, but something weird happened at the end ^B
^Ha! Yeah, nice try, Arcas. I camped out here all night to make sure I didn't miss your big day.
^Also, not the point! We're here to support Arcas.
^Look, I get it. I was pretty nervous on my first expedition.
^Look, Arcas. You've spent a lot of time preparing for this, and you're ready. You'll be great.
s1: ^What was all that about, Ann? Can you go one sentence without making fun of me?
^Come on, Percy, we tease each other all the time! Why did you have to flip out over it?
^Well, for one, you never asked if it was okay to poke fun at me!
^`( They're arguing again.^1.^1.^1 better leave them to it. )
s2: ^`( They're still arguing. Better leave them be. )
